page.title: 18The Carnival Princess
page.content: The Carnival is held every year at Brockwell Park which is in Wick.Most organisations do a float. There is a Carnival Queen and two Carnival Princesses .To be the Queen you must be 11 or over .To be the Princess you must be 5 to 11 years.To be the Princess your name must be drawn out of a hat and the same goes for the Queen as well.There are lots of stalls where you buy things.At night there is a disco You can have things to eat like beefburgers hot_dogs and there is a bar.The stalls include toys,books, food and drink and quite a few more.They sometimes have an inflatable.You have to pay 20p and take your shoes off.Last year the school P.T.A. ran a badge making stall.It was good.
